alert.note: Alert for Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 19 at 10:26AM MDT until May 22 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Wood River near Ketchum affecting Sun Valley Region zone. .Warm temperatures may melt high mountain snowpack and increase river flows. Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Big Wood River Ketchum 8.0 7.7 Fri 9 am MDT 7.5 7.7 7.8 &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. IDZ073-202030- /O.EXT.KPIH.FL.A.0004.000000T0000Z-230522T2200Z/ /BWKI1.0.SM.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.OO/ 1026 AM MDT Fri May 19 2023 ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Big Wood River near Ketchum. * WHEN...Until Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Lowland flooding from near the SNRA building downriver into Ketchum. Property near Chocolate Gulch Road downstream to Ketchum will have flooding; Sun Peak Picnic Area flooded; Fox Creek Trail head may be closed * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM MDT Friday the stage was 7.7 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached based on the latest forecast information. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
